info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 12:33AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lehigh, Carbon, southwestern Monroe and west central Northampton Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1233 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mcadoo, or near Hazleton, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lehighton, Palmerton, Jim Thorpe, Slatington, Nesquehoning, Weatherly, Walnutport, New Mahoning, Neffs, Coffeetown, New Tripoli, Berlinsville, Emerald, Kresgeville, Jonas, Danielsville, Beltzville State Park, Penn Forest Reservoir, Jordan Valley and Schnecksville. This includes Northeast Extension between mile markers 59 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
